Headline: The Youngest Female Monster Truck Driver Builds Her Own Rides
Article_Body: Rosalee Ramer can jump her Monster Jam truck, Wild Flower, 30 feet in the air. But she says that's not high enough — she wants to be able to jump her freshman dorm, which is twice that height. The Georgia Tech engineering student tours professionally as a driver, but by day she's in the workshop at school, building the monster truck that she says will be a game changer.
